talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibration, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Trouble? That's not it! Anyway, what the heck is going on here?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks incredibly angry.)
Tell me! What trouble did you make this time?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How could I not see it? A massive new road sprang up out of nowhere!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You came here without even knowing what happened?
(He seems to clench his teeth as if biting his tongue.)
It was a huge vibration that shook the whole barrier, and you didn't feel it? At least you recognize that the place has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah, exactly. Space has been totally rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
The king and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are. The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why has this happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT> specifically?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Think of the underlying principles of this world, fool. Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams. This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects. It's because the whole dream has moved.

$Velskud$
… You still don't know what's inSaint Haven?

$Velskud$
(Glares at you coldly)

$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
I'm sure you remember what the collapse was about.

${user_nick}$
Because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... The Goddess's nightmares are being created randomly?

$Velskud$
You've finally found a use for that tiny head of yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, that's why this place has changed, too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it. You consider this place to be safe, but Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's nothing wrong with the barrier though, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, not at all! But with that amount of vibration... The Goddess is not going to wake up, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… How dare you doubt my ability? You've become quite brave.

$Velskud$
Why, are you worried?

${user_nick}$
It's obvious! Don't we need the Cup of Healing to wake up the Goddess? Hold on… But if the Goddess wakes up, does what Feder said before come true? Our entire world will disappear! What the heck do we do?
(I can't organize my thoughts!)

$Velskud$
Stop making a fuss. I'm having enough trouble thinking about Labynia... Wait, what is that?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_01.ogg}
Who is this kid?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(</FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Argenta</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>! It's definitely </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Argenta</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>, but she doesn't recognize me!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_02.ogg}
What are you doing here, kid? That blank stare tells me you still haven't woken up yet. Quit hanging around here and go home.

${user_nick}$
(Wait… This is the Cristal Stream...? I guess I've traveled through time like I did once before. But I never thought I'd see Argenta again. What should I say?)
Well… I mean…

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_03.ogg}
I told you it's dangerous here. Don't you understand me? I guess with that tiny weapon of yours you think you're invincible. Go back.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Argenta, please listen to me. It's important!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_04.ogg}
You, do you know my name? Who are you?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_05.ogg}
You… I see. I can feel the energy from you. Are you caught up in the flow of time and space? There is no end to the problems caused by that Monolith, honestly. Listen kid... How did you get into this dream within a dream?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_06.ogg}
The Goddess's dream within a dream, the deepest of all dreams. Think of it as a shadow of the past. It's a surprise to see a human being getting caught up this deep. Well, you won't last long anyway. But I wouldn't want to see you die, so take my hand.
(Argenta reaches out her hand as if she's annoyed.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops </FONT><FONT color=#387206>{user_nick}</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>'s body.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_07.ogg}
Be quiet! Oh...? Is that a jewel in your body? And not just one? Who are you, really?!

$Argenta$
Tell me. What has happened to you?

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This is… <FONT color=#086171>Old Saint Haven</FONT> is it not?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian${action:Talk}
{user_class} {user_nick}! You are here, too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You show off your brilliant reasoning ability.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_05.ogg}
Right! I think I was swept up in the Monolith and brought back in time. I don't know why the heck I ended up here of all place though.

${user_nick}$
Hmm… I don't think this is simply a past version of Saint Haven. First of all, there's no one here. Has Saint Haven ever been like that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Is he aware of the changes in the city?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian$
Whoa, you're right! There really is no one but us… Ugh, don't tell me the city's changed again!

${user_nick}$
It looks different from that Saint Haven, though. People didn't disappear there! By the way, you knew the city had changed, didn't you Xian?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why is it so surprising that I knew?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_04.ogg}
No one else knew the city had changed, but you did. As for what this means...

$Warrior Xian$
Huh?! No, that's not what I meant! However, everyone here seems to know that the city has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Xian's face has darkened. All you do is be supportive for now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warrior Xian${sound:npc_war_q3844_06.ogg}
We have to get out of here somehow. But I don't know what to do...

${user_nick}$
There must be a way out! Though it may take some time to find out what it is.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

${user_nick}$
There must be a way out! Though it may take some time to find out what it is.

$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
Fancy seeing you again here. How do you do, {user_class} {user_nick} ?

${user_nick}$
Triana! You're here too. This is Saint Haven, right? But… It feels like I've gone back to the past!

$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_01.ogg}
Right, this is the Old Saint Haven... But we're the only ones here.

${user_nick}$
Right, that's the weirdest part. If we're in the past, we should be able to see the people who were here before.
(Is this really a dream within a dream like Argenta said?)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What is it? Do you have a theory about all this?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_04.ogg}
I've been wondering about that too. The air here is different. Everything's stopped. Maybe... Just maybe...
(Triana's face darkens.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you trying to freak me out or something?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_05.ogg}
Maybe Saint Haven hasn't changed. Perhaps we've been kicked out of the real world.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Please don't call things you're not even sure of the Goddess's will!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_06.ogg}
If this is the will of the Goddess, should we obey it? No, surely not.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I met Argenta before I came here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana$
(Triana looks at you with surprise in her eyes.)
{user_nick}?

$Archer Triana$
Argenta…

${user_nick}$
I thought I had traveled back in time, but it wasn't the case. It was something called a 'dream within a dream'. What it means is, we're in the Goddess's dream, one way or another. Though this dream feels a little more unpredictable than normal.

$Archer Triana$
Un… predictable…

${user_nick}$
Anyway, it can't be a coincidence that everyone here knows about the changes in Saint Haven, encountered the Monolith, and that we're all safe after everything that's happened. Let's not assume we've been abandoned here until we're sure what's going on!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's nothing to apologize for. Let's find a way out. Cheer up!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
(Triana looks a little surprised, then shows a gentle smile.)
You're right, I was being hasty. Please forgive me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(After ending the conversation, Triana becomes lost in thought.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana$
Thank you for saying that.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Archer Triana$
Thank you for saying that.

$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
{user_nick}. This is a bit of an awkward situation to say 'Hello, nice to see you.'

${user_nick}$
Right. How is it that we all ended up here? Velskud says the Goddess's dream has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Oh, really? It is a relief to know I wasn't alone, but what explains the king's absence...?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan${sound:npc_cl_q3853_07.ogg}
I don't see His Majesty Cassius . He too was aware of the changes…

$Cleric Edan$
From what I hear... it's called a dream within a dream. They say only a few people have returned safely from this place.

$Cleric Edan${sound:npc_cl_q3853_08.ogg}
Everything is the Goddess's will... However, if we're in a nightmare, it's a different story.

${user_nick}$
If this is a nightmare, yes. But isn't it different from the nightmares we've seen? There are no monsters. It's just calm and peaceful. It must be because there's no one here...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Clerics really don't know how to just accept what someone says at face value...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan$
Certainly that's true. But too much is happening these days.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(It angers you, but it's hard to refute. Even if Velskud is cleaning up a lot of the mess…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan$
This is not some kind of anomalous space like the Monolith, but considering what happened with the Labyrinth and the opening of the Monolith's door lately, we cannot be certain its influence hasn't reached Mistland.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wait, that's too much of a stretch!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan${sound:npc_cl_q3853_09.ogg}
If we've entered the Monolith's threshold... Don't tell me this is the Goddess Vestinel's doing.

$Cleric Edan$
{user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
Velskud is keeping the barrier safe! Besides, even if it is a dream within a dream and a dangerous place, we're still beyond the Goddess Vestinel's influence, right?

$Cleric Edan$
I suppose so, but…

${user_nick}$
(Come to think of it, that might be correct. Argenta said we wouldn't last here long, but... Somehow, I feel safer here, and I think there's a reason.)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

${user_nick}$
And feel it! Have you ever felt threatened here? It's not just me. Close your eyes and feel around. It's a place with no flow, no wind, but I don't feel scared at all.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(But still, it is concerning that we don't know the way out. What do we do?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
(Edan, who was thinking seriously for a while, nods his head.)
Yes, you're right. It seems my thoughts only grew darker the deeper I pondered.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Cleric Edan$
(Edan, who was thinking seriously for a while, nods his head.)
Yes, you're right. It seems my thoughts only grew darker the deeper I pondered.

$Velskud$
You troublemaker! What are you doing here!

※You cannot proceed with this quest while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Look, we didn't come here because we wanted to!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet! You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You fools, go back to where you came from!

$Velskud$
(Velskud glares in your direction with terrifying eyes. It would be beneficial for your health not to say anything right now.)
Do you know where you are right now? You're in a dream within a dream. I couldn't hold onto you before, so you were swept all the way here!

$Velskud$
I thought you were an okay kid, but I guess I was mistaken. It must have been hard for that woman to clean up your messes all the time...
(His mouth snaps shut and he seems to be holding back his anger.)
Quickly, grab my hand.

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(So this place… is the <FONT color=#086171>Silver Dragon's Forcefield</FONT>…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Argenta.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see her right in front of you. Talk to Argenta.

Cristal Stream-Argenta

※To get to Argenta, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Warrior Xian.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Argenta. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Warrior Xian

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Archer Triana.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Argenta. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Archer Triana

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Cleric Edan.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Argenta. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Cleric Edan

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Argenta, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅶ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
